mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.username as user_username, u.password as user_password, u.created_at as user_created_at, ur.role user_role_role, t.id as task_id, t.title as task_title, t.description as task_description, t.status as task_status, t.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, t.created_at as task_created_at FROM users u LEFT JOIN tasks t on u.id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN users_roles ur on u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.username as user_username, u.password as user_password, u.created_at as user_created_at, ur.role user_role_role, t.id as task_id, t.title as task_title, t.description as task_description, t.status as task_status, t.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, t.created_at as task_created_at FROM users u LEFT JOIN tasks t on u.id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN users_roles ur on u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username}
